helpText: Connect to harman/kardon speakers using the HKWHub App. Control speakers, stream music, add songs/ sound file from iOS Music app to the media list, so that client devices can remotely access the list and play media in the list. For example, a door open/close sensor can send a request to play ‘dog-barking’ sound in the media list of the HKWHub app.
name: harman/kardon HKWHub
